Rokuta is still looking for Taiki. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 書簡
A Letter
Послание
Shokan
episode.summary: Rancho, a message carrying bird, comes to Rakushun at his college campus in En. It was a message from Yoko, now a new queen of Kei. She tells him that she found out Asano could be alive, and that she visited Rakushun’s mother in Ko, and also invites him to her enthronement. Rakushun sends the bird back to Yoko. They say to each other they’re doing fine, but they both know that’s not true. They’re both having a hard time fitting in their new environments. Yoko sets the name of Kei’s new era Seki-Raku, Seki from Yoko “Sekishi”, Raku from “Rakushun.” Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 一章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 1
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 1
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Isshou
episode.summary: In Meiji are, Japan, Suzu Oki was born into a poor farmer’s family. She was sold to pay the family’s debt, but fell off a cliff and ended up in Kyokai in the other world. Because she can’t speak the language, she travels with Shusei, the traveling performers. One day she meets an Immortal named Riyo who can understand her language. Rin begs her to take her. Riyo takes her to the mountain and gives her an Immortal Status so she can understand the language, but practically slaves her for 100 years. Shokei is a girl of the same age as Suzu, but lives a luxurious life as the daughter (Koshu) of Ho-o. However, Ho-o’s policy is too strict and the people rebel to take over the dynasty. Shokei’s parents are both killed, and she’s forced to give up her Immortal status to start living as an orphan. Yoko is about the same age as them. She deals with her own problem as a new queen, but now she faces her crowd of Kei Kingdom at the enthronement. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 二章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 2
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 2
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Ni Shou
episode.summary: Riyo comes home to tell Suzu about the new Kei-o to torture her. The new Kei-o comes from the same back ground as Suzu, but her social status is much higher than her. Suzu starts hoping that Kei-o will come rescue her. On the other hand, Shokei, the former princess of Ho, now endures tough manual labor as an orphan. The orphanage’s manager also finds out Shokei’s background and blames her for the execution of her son. Then, Shokei hears a rumor about the new Kei-o and gets jealous. Yoko finishes the enthronement and talks to En-o, Enki and Rakushun. She’s indecisive about the first notice to the people in Kei and Baku State leader’s issue. But she finally manages to make a good decision... or so she thought... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 三章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 3
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 3
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - San Shou
episode.summary: Suzu dreams of Kei-o coming to rescue her from her mean master Riyo, who sends her to a dangerous cliff with a fierce monster for punishment. Shokei cannot accept the change from the past and is jealous of Kei-o. She gets caught singing a song from the palace, and all villagers find out her past as Princess, but she is in denial of her father’s injustice. Kei-o, Yoko, studies under 3 personal aides, Taishi, Taifu, Taiho, and learns of politics among the Chief Officers. Yoko is tired and accepts a dinner invitation by Taishi. The Head of the 6 Chief Officers(Chosai), Seikyo, asks for Yoko’s decision on creating jobs for soldiers. Since Seikyo is more familiar with the subject, Yoko leaves the decision up to him, and that makes Keiki unhappy. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 四章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 4
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 4
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Yon Shou
episode.summary: Suzu escapes from her mean master to visit Sai-o in Chokan Palace. Kei State’s Army also saves Shokei from the villagers trying to kill her after they found out her identity as Princess of Ho, and takes her to Gekkei, who killed Shokei’s father. Gekkei tells her to leave the kingdom, and the queen of Kyo Kingdom across Kyo-Kai takes her in. Yoko finds out she was a target for assassination by her 3 personal aides including her dinner host, Taishi, and Kokan whom she recently discharged from his position, and also Chief Heaven’s Officer. Fortunately, the attempt is stopped by the palace’s security. At the meeting with officers, Yoko realizes that she is trying to please everybody, still acting the same as before, and starts thinking about leaving the palace. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 五章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 5
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 5
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Go Shou
episode.summary: Gekkei saves Shokei out of trouble and sends her to Kyo Kingdom. Kyo-o gives her a choice to whether work as a servant in the palace or live in a Rike(orphanage). Shokei grows hostile towards Kei-o and Kyo-o. Suzu loves the Sai Kingdom’s palace but Sai-o recommends that she go live among people to grow up. Suzu leaves for Kei Kingdom to depend on Kei-o who is from Horai like herself. Yoko became a queen to improve the living conditions of the people in the kingdom but gets no result, so she leaves the palace to go live with the people to find out what their needs are. Suzu reaches So Kingdom and runs into the Shusei group she used to travel with. She also meets a new Kai-Kyaku. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 六章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 6
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 6
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Roku Shou
episode.summary: Suzu runs into a Shusei group she used to travel with in So Kingdom, and meets another Kai-Kyaku, Asano. But he refuses Suzu’s offer to travel to Kei with her. Suzu also saves a boy from falling off a ship, but he tells her he doesn’t like her, nor feels sorry for her Kai-Kyaku background. Yoko goes to live with the people at a Rike to find out the ordinary people’s needs. When she protects them from a monster’s attack, she sees Rangyoku struggle to save her brother, and wishes she had someone to care about, too. Shokei cannot take working as a servant in the palace, so she steals jewels and runs away. Kyo-o sends out the army to find her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 七章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 7
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 7
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Nana Shou
episode.summary: Yoko starts living in a different world with ordinary people in the kingdom. Enho, the old man, at the Rike teaches Yoko about a village and gives her advice. When Suzu gets on a ship to Kei, Seishu tells her a story about the death of his family and makes her realize that she was just playing a victim, blaming everyone for the pain but herself, and that she’s not the only one who has to go through the pain. Shokei finds out that if she takes a ship from Tai to Kei as a refugee, she can get a Kei ID. She gets arrested at a hotel with Rakushun who was sharing the room with her. Keiki’s messenger, Hyoki, worries Yoko with the news that Kokan who plotted Yoko’s assassination is still missing. Yoko then overhears the name of the Chief Heaven’s Officer, who was part of the assassination plot, spoken in the conversation between Enho and his guest. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 八章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 8
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 8
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Hachi Shou
episode.summary: Shokei gets arrested by Ryu’s officials but released easily for bribing them. Because traveling to Tai is dangerous, Rakushun offers to take her to En. Shokei learns a lot from Rakushun but is still unable to understand her responsibility as a Koshu (King’s daughter). Suzu’s party gets raided by gangs because she did not hire guards. They are saved but Suzu starts blaming herself. When others tell her it’s not her fault, she gets angry, which makes her relate to Master Riyo. Yoko investigates to locate assassins and finds herself in trouble but is saved by a boy named Sekki. Then she finds Seishu bleeding to death in the street. At the boy’s dying site, people’s carelessness aggravates her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 転章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Interlude
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Интерлюдия
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Tenshou
episode.summary: Rakushun takes Shokei to the border of Ryu and En. After Shokei lost her parents, she had no idea why she had to suffer so much in poverty, hated by many, but Rakushun teaches her the responsibility to the people, which was missing in Shokei’s family’s administration. Kei-o, Yoko, goes to live among the people in the kingdom for learning experience, and Rakushun completely believes she will be back on the throne as a better queen. Shokei wishes she had that kind of care and trust she never had, but Rakushun advises her to move on and start a new life. Asano also talks to Shoko about how wrong the world is and they start a scheme. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 九章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 9
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 9
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Kyuu Shou
episode.summary: Suzu cannot accept Shoko getting away with murdering Seishun, and decides to revenge him. Yoko also finds out about Shoko’s evil behavior from Enho. Shokei goes to Kei and hears people complain about new Kei-o and unimproved living conditions in the kingdom, but also hears that Wa State’s Shi-Sui will give refugees a piece of land and citizenship. Suzu finds out that Shoko is protected by a person in a higher place, and decides to revenge Seishun on Shoko and Kei-o. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 十章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 10
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 10
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juu Shou
episode.summary: Suzu decides to revenge on Shoko and Kei-o for Seishun. Yoko senses someone’s after her and investigates Wa State. Suzu tries to kill Kokan but is stopped by Kosho and his group, who turn out to have the same purpose of beating Shoko. Shokei stops by Wa State’s capital, Meikaku, to witness a criminal being nailed. That reminds her of her past and she throws a rock at a guard. Yoko happens to be there and tries to save her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 十一章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 11
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 11
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juuisshou
episode.summary: Shokei is saved by a man named Kantai. Kantai tells her about Shoko and Gao, and Shokei feels obligated to report them to Kei-o, so Kei-o won’t repeat the same mistake of being ignorant as she did. Suzu and Kosho talk about the two tyrants and completely agree on negative views on them. Suzu tells Yoko about Kokan’s good reputation among people and Yoko gets frustrated about her decision she made on him in the past. Yoko goes back to the Rike to find dead Rangyoku and injured Kei-Kei. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 十二章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 12
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 12
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juuni Shou
episode.summary: While Yoko visits Wa State, the Rike in Ei State is raided. Rangyoku is killed; Enho is kidnapped; Kei-Kei is wounded and taken to Kimba Palace. Yoko investigates Ro, the man who visited Enho before, but he’s gone. Shokei is asked to sell Toki’s to make money to hire soldiers while Suzu is asked to buy Tokis. They meet and realize they share the same purpose, except that Shokei corrects Suzu’s misconception about Kei-o. Kosho’s group suspects Yoko probing for information, and they move to a different hotel. Yoko gets suspicious of them for kidnapping of Enho, but after Kosho’s explanation, Yoko joins his group for rebellion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 十三章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 13
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 13
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juusan Shou
episode.summary: Yoko joins a rebel to defeat Shoko. The rebel break up Shoko’s 3000 soldiers by raiding one of Shoko’s houses and storage first, leaving the letter “Shu-on”(meaning Death-to-Shoko.) Kantai and Shokei hear about the revolt and they’re worried about Gaho’s support for Shoko. Yoko and the rebel raid Shoko’s another house as a decoy, and Yoko runs into Asano there. Now that Asano is with Shoko, Yoko decides to stick with her mission as a queen, leaves him and goes to Shoko’s Go Castle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 十四章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 14
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 14
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juuyon Shou
episode.summary: The rebels led by Kosho and Yoko take Shoko’s castle and arrest Shoko. Yoko decides to let Shoko live for confessing the corruption in higher places of the government. The castle is, however, already surrounded by Shoko’s soldiers and the State Army’s main force is arriving soon. Suzu sends Asano to get Kantai’s help in Meikaku but he gets stopped by Summer Officers. When the rebels try to force their way out of the castle at dawn, the strong State’s cavalries strike. Then, Kantai’s force arrives to help them. It turns out that Kantai has a bigger plan than arresting Shoko. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 十五章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 15
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 15
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juugo Shou
episode.summary: It turns out that the former Chosai, Seikyo, controlled Gaho and Shoko. Seikyo sends the Royal Army to fight the rebels in Takuho not knowing that Kei-o, Yoko is among them. Suzu, Shokei and Yoko can relate to the Takuho guys not joining the rebellion because it used to be more comfortable for them to play a victim than to make a courageous move for fair treatment. Kosho and Sekki debate over whether to help the villagers under attack by the enemy, which will put them in bigger trouble. Yoko, Suzu and Shokei debate over whether to save a boy being killed, knowing that others are being killed elsewhere. They all conclude to do the best they can to live by their principle. Yoko believes results should be better achieved by discouraging the enemy without killing them, and that’s why she decided to take Shoko to court instead of killing him. Yoko reveals her identity as Kei-o to Suzu and Shokei, and Suzu and Shokei reveal theirs to the villagers who blamed the rebels for starting trouble for them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風の万里 黎明の空 終章
A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Last Chapter
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть последняя
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Shuushou
episode.summary: Keiki comes to Takuho and Yoko rides him to the Royal Army to prove her legitimacy as the queen. Yoko orders the Royal Army and State Army to go arrest Gaho and Seikyo and save Enho. Yoko goes back to the rebels to thank them for doing the job for her. When Yoko goes back to the palace, she asks Shokei and Suzu to join her, appoints Kokan as the Chosai, Shohaku(Enho) as Taishi, Kantai as the Royal Army General, and Saibo as the Wa State’s leader. She also bans bowing because bowing as a rule does more harm than good to everyone. She believes that one must have courage and earn respect, and that’s good for the kingdom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 乗月
Ally of the Moon
В лунном свете
Jougetsu
episode.summary: Yoko visits En-o at Mt. Sho to ask what to do with Shoko who abused his political power to test the Heaven’s will to see if Yoko deserves to be a queen. Kantai delivers personal letters from Yoko and Shokei to Gekkei, Kei State’s Leader, currently in charge of Ho’s temporary government. Gekkei has a dilemma about taking the throne and is about to leave the government because he led the rebels to defeat the king who was too harsh on criminal punishment yet he admired his pure vision. He killed the king for the people but he feels that if he takes the throne now, his action will no longer make sense to himself. Kantai, who was also a rebel in Kei, suggests the establishment of “a government in the moon shadow”(waiting for the sun(= king) to come up). Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東の海神 西の滄海 一章
Sea God of the East, Azure Sea of the West - Chapter 1
Бог Моря на востоке, Океан на западе. Часть 1
Higashi no Watatsumi, Nishi no Soukai - Isshou
episode.summary: En-o is at the grave of a man named Atsuyu. He tells Yoko a story about him. After Shoryu becomes En-o, En Kingdom regains peace. He is always among the people to listen to their voice and catches the rumor of Gen State’s rebellion. Enki, Rokuta, gets kidnapped by Koya, a boy who was raised by a monster like himself. The boy’s boss, Atsuyu is in charge of Gen State, and asks Rokuta to be his hostage so En-o will accept his demand for riparian work for the people in Gen State. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東の海神 西の滄海 二章
Sea God of the East, Azure Sea of the West - Chapter 2
Бог Моря на востоке, Океан на западе. Часть 2
Higashi no Watatsumi, Nishi no Soukai - Ni Shou
episode.summary: Rokuta agrees with Atsuyu’s purpose and to be taken hostage by him, but disagrees with his demand to establish an emperor position above the king. Battle will be unavoidable. Rokuta asks Koya to stop Atsuyu, but Koya owes Atsuyu and also Atsuyu believes in his action, so he cannot stop him. En-o surprises his officers with his bold plan to deal with the crisis. Rokuta is a Kirin, a creature of justice and mercy, so he does not like authorities, but Ribi convinces him that Shoryu is doing a great job as a king when officers are not looking. Ribi tries to kill herself to let Rokuta out of jail and also to show her loyalty to the king. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東の海神 西の滄海 三章
Sea God of the East, Azure Sea of the West - Chapter 3
Бог Моря на востоке, Океан на западе. Часть 3
Higashi no Watatsumi, Nishi no Soukai - San Shou
episode.summary: The king’s soldiers’ number has grown to 20,000, and the Royal Amy’s in Kankyu, 30,000. Shoryu is among the enemy’s soldiers, and he sees the king’s soldiers send workers to build a dike for Rokusui River. Atsuyu suspects that the king’s soldiers are trying to flood his castle, and orders his man to cut the dike in the upper reach of the river to sink a town. Atsuyu’s female officer, Meishin, tells Rokuta that Atsuyu has changed and helps him escape. Rokuta wanders into the underground maze and runs into Gen State’s Leader and his double whose tongue was cut off. Meishin questions Atsuyu’s move to sink a town and Koya cold-heartedly feeds her to his monster. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東の海神 西の滄海 終章
Sea God of the East, Azure Sea of the West - Last Chapter
Бог Моря на востоке, Океан на западе. Часть последняя
Higashi no Watatsumi, Nishi no Soukai - Shuushou
episode.summary: Shoryu and Rokuta run into each other in the underground maze of Ganboku Castle. Rokuta smells blood in Koya, senses that Koya killed a man and feels sad. When Gen State’s soldiers start cutting the dike in the upper reach of Rakusui River, the farmers in the area become angry and fight the state soldiers, then the king’s soldiers come to their rescue. After ordering to cut the dike, Atsuyu completely loses trust by his officers. When En-o shows up, Atsuyu shamelessly starts blaming others and begs for mercy. When En-o gives him one and turns around, Atsuyu tries to kill him and gets killed. En-o promises to Rokuta and Koya a rich and peaceful kingdom. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 東の海神 西の滄海 転章
Sea God of the East, Azure Sea of the West - Transition Chapter
Бог Моря на востоке, Океан на западе. Интерлюдия
Higashi no Watatsumi, Nishi no Soukai - Tenshou
episode.summary: Since Yoko grew up in Horai, she can not believe in the Heaven’s Will, yet, she is afraid of repeating the mistake Shoko made for the same suspicion. En-o tells Yoko a story about a man he calls another him. En-o and Atsuyu both had a cowardly father. Atsuyu got rid of his father for the people and En-o let the people die for his father. Atsuyu demands a new emperor status above the king for the people, and En-o faces him to see who deserves the king. En-o survives and Atsuyu lies in his grave. En-o’s story does not give Yoko answers but a plenty of inspiration. Source: crunchyroll
